Malaysia installs Sultan Ibrahim of Johor state as new kingMalaysia's Sultan Ibrahim from the southern state of Johor was sworn in as the country's new king on Wednesday, taking the oath of office in a ceremony at the national palace in Kuala Lumpur. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:32:15 GMT JALM5BS5PFJCFAY4ILZCWJMXRM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-installs-sultan-ibrahim-johor-state-new-king-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
China has indisputable sovereignty over Scarborough Shoal in South China Sea -Coast GuardChina has indisputable sovereignty over the Scarborough Shoal and its adjacent waters, and has always resolutely countered infringements by the Philippines, a spokesperson for China Coast Guard said in a statement released late Tuesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:25:58 GMT CAFUFVSRPJKJZOUMHVB7SW6BDU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-has-indisputable-sovereignty-over-scarborough-shoal-south-china-sea-coast-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pacific Islands need to boost digital security to join undersea cable, says US officialPacific Islands nations that want to connect to U.S.-funded undersea cables will need to secure their digital ecosystems to guard against data risks from China, a senior U.S. State Department official said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:17:37 GMT GR5VS2UI2VNA5NIBF4YTBYGAFM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pacific-islands-need-boost-digital-security-join-undersea-cable-says-us-official-2024-01-31/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Mexican leak of journalists' personal data raises security worriesThe theft of the personal data of hundreds of journalists in Mexico has raised fresh safety concerns in one of the most dangerous countries in the world for media professionals. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:09:27 GMT J6H4PKZTPJME7ECIEODW7TYGCU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-leak-journalists-personal-data-raises-security-worries-2024-01-31/Brendan O'Boyle, David Alire Garcia世界美洲
Myanmar junta eases election registration rules ahead of expiry of state of emergencyMyanmar's military government on Wednesday announced an easing of election registration rules for political parties, hours ahead of the expiry of a state of emergency in place since a coup three years ago. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 02:00:45 GMT GJBTVQQETZPHHKHCQ5LYLDK6JU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-junta-eases-election-registration-rules-ahead-expiry-state-emergency-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Heavy fog suspends shipping at Chinese ports; Shanghai issues heightened advisoryHeavy fog has suspended the operation of ships travelling through the Qiongzhou Strait off the coast of China's Guangdong province and several cities, including Shanghai, have issued warning advisories, Chinese state media reported on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 01:46:11 GMT QLC4YGZA4VKK7A5D5WPS3WMQ4U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/heavy-fog-suspends-shipping-chinese-ports-shanghai-issues-heightened-advisory-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
U.S. F-16 crashes in South Korea, pilot safely ejectsA U.S. F-16 fighter jet crashed into the sea off South Korea's west coast on Wednesday and the pilot was rescued safely, a U.S. Air Force unit stationed in the country said, the second crash of an F-16 in just over a month in the country. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 01:27:31 GMT OIKS3X6QCFN3BMG4VFXCRSPEKE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-f-16-jet-crashes-south-korea-pilot-safe-yonhap-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
US needs to work with greater intensity in the Pacific - NZ foreign ministerNew Zealand will start talks on Wednesday with Australia about cooperating with the AUKUS trilateral defence partnership between, Foreign Minister Winston Peters said, adding Washington needed to do more in the Pacific to counter other political influences there. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 01:03:30 GMT JFSR2RQ6H5LQDAPMEKZ66C7JKA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-needs-work-with-greater-intensity-pacific-nz-min-2024-01-31/Lucy Craymer世界
Explorer may have found wreckage of Amelia Earhart's plane in PacificA former U.S. Air Force intelligence officer says he believes he has found the wreckage of Amelia Earhart's plane, which disappeared nine decades ago, using sonar data from a deep-sea drone. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 00:47:30 GMT奥特尔VEW2HNL7LLQQZN2HTQGCXU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/explorer-may-have-found-wreckage-amelia-earharts-plane-pacific-2024-01-31/Ashraf Fahim世界美国
Taiwan angered at 'unilateral' China change to Taiwan Strait flight pathTaiwan's government expressed anger after China "unilaterally" changed a flight path close to the sensitive median line in the Taiwan Strait, saying it appeared to be a deliberate attempt to change the status quo for possible military means. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 00:34:48 GMT BGLBW3PR4JI6JFM2MFZSKEBXHQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-angered-uniside-china-change-taiwan-strait-flight-path-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Canada's foreign affairs department hit by data breachThe Canadian government said on Tuesday that its global affairs department suffered a data breach and that there was unauthorized access to personal information of users including employees. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 22:43:04 GMT OCXSZC3YBFMVPDYYHG4JU6DNGQ https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/canadas-foreign-affairs-department-hit-by-data-breach-2024-01-30/Reuters技术网络安全
